View Transaction

Loading...

Name: {{transaction.name}}
Cost: {{ currency.format(transaction.cost)}}
Date: {{ transaction.date.toString() }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-view', templateUrl: './view.component.html' }) export class ViewComponent { public transaction?: Transaction; public id?: String; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit() { this.activatedRoute.paramMap.subscribe(params => { const id = params.get("id"); this.http.get(`/api/transaction/${id}`).subscribe(result => { this.transaction = result; }, error => console.error(error)); }) } public currency = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-PH', { style: 'currency', currency: 'PHP', }); //constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { // http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { // this.forecasts = result; // }, error => console.error(error)); //} } interface Transaction { id: number name: string; date: Date; cost: number; }
